001package gbw.melange.common.shading.generative.checker;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color;
004
005public interface ICheckerBuilder {
006
007    ICheckerShader build();
008    ICheckerBuilder setFirstColor(Color color);
009    ICheckerBuilder setSecondColor(Color color);
010    ICheckerBuilder setRows(double count);
011    ICheckerBuilder setColumns(double count);
012
013}
